verses.roman:
taṁ patantaṁ vimānena
saha-takṣakam ambarāt
vilokyāṅgirasaḥ prāha
rājānaṁ taṁ bṛhaspatiḥ

synonyms: tam—him; patantam—falling; vimānena—in his airplane; saha-takṣakam—with Takṣaka; ambarāt—from the sky; vilokya—observing; āṅgirasaḥ—the son of Aṅgirā; prāha—spoke; rājānam—to the King (Janamejaya); tam—to him; bṛhaspatiḥ—Bṛhaspati.
translation: Bṛhaspati, the son of Aṅgirā Muni, seeing Indra falling from the sky in his airplane along with Takṣaka, approached King Janamejaya and spoke to him as follows.
